title: Is the Poco C3 worth buying? - Quora

response.answer_text: Poco C3 is one of the best releases by the brand that is equipped with such nice features and in a very affordable price. The phone is absolutely worth buying. The 6.53-inch touchscreen display is good enough for playing games and watching videos and photos in a wide screen. As far as the performance is concerned, Poco C3 is powered by an octa core 2 GHz, Dual core, Cortex A75 + 1.8 GHz, Hexa Core, Cortex A55 MediaTek Helio G35 processor. It runs Android 10 and packs a 5000mAh battery that supports proprietary fast charging. The processor is good for gaming and prevents heating and lagging issues in the phone.  Poco C3 has a triple camera setup on the rear with a 13 MP Primary Camera with f/2.2 aperture, 8 MP Wide Angle, Ultra-Wide-Angle Camera, 5 MP Camera, 2 MP, Depth Camera. The camera has some amazing features like Digital Zoom, Auto Flash, Face detection, Touch to focus. The Poco C3 is priced at Rs. 7,499 for the base 3GB + 32GB storage model and at Rs. 8,999 for the 4GB + 64GB storage variant.

Yeah, Poco C3 can actually be a pretty good device for most of the users. It has some really good features at low cost and I think this C from Poco might turn out better than the other latest Cs from Realme. Talking about the smartphone, the best thing I like about it is its storage section at the cost. The smartphone occurs in two variants, costing 7.5k for 3GB/32GB variant and 9k for 4GB/64GB variant. Apart from this, the smartphone is powered by a MediaTek Helio G35 octa-core processor that is clocked at 2GHz and it has good gaming performance as well. There is a 13MP triple rear camera with a 5MP front camera and a 5000mAH battery with 10W fast charging support. Overall the features at the cost are amazing and it is absolutely worth buying.
